name: Greater Spell Runes
summary: You gain more powerful spell runes.
description:
You gain more powerful spell runes. You gain a spell rune corresponding to a 4th-level arcane spell. At 12th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 5th-level arcane spell, and at 14th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 6th-level arcane spell.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
